title: BEAUTIFUL AND LARGE 2 BED 2 BATH - Koreatown!!!RE1
posting_body: This *MUST SEE* 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment, located near Korea Town and is modernly styled with a home warming and cozy feel as well.
The apartment features a open floor plan, elegant appliances, LOTS of cabinet space and elegant bright flooring.
Additionally, this apartment is updated with many modern features and is in walking distance to the public transportation.
*Brand new light fixtures with fan throughout apt*
628 North Harvard Boulevard has a Walk Score of 89 out of 100.
This location is Very Walkable so most errands can be accomplished on foot.
628 North Harvard Boulevard is a 22 minute walk from the Metro Red Line (802) at the Vermont / Beverly Station stop.
This location is in the Wilshire Center - Koreatown neighborhood in Los Angeles.
Nearby parks include Lemon Grove Park, Robert Burns Park and Wilton Historic District.
Monthly rent $2,350, security deposit $2,350, pet deposit $250, application fee $30 per applicant. 12 month lease.
